Hi,

Hi! I'm Christopher — a software engineer at Digital Solution Foundry by day, digital tinkerer by passion. I'm big on clean code, accessible design, and crafting user interfaces that don’t just work, but feel good to use.

When I'm not wrangling pixels or polishing UX flows, you'll probably find me elbow-deep in a LEGO set, trying to learn how to draw (badly but enthusiastically), or happily getting lost in the little details that make software a bit nicer to use.

This blog is where I share things I'm building, learning, and occasionally nerding out about.

Besides this here blog, you can also find me on , Bluesky , GitHub , and LinkedIn . Welcome!
